sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Red Rock Ranch offers spacious custom homes on large 2.5+ acre lots nestled against the Mtns between Monument and Palmer Lake. District 38 schools serve this area. Two parks close by provide picnic areas, baseball fields, playgrounds, and fishing in the lake. Pike National Forest is located to the west with miles of trails and recreational activities available for homeowners to enjoy.
